content: materials - 4 skeins of koigu s premium merino this is color #1505 - a size f 3 75 mm crochet hook gauge 5 single crochets = 1 inch size to fit ages 2-4 as a dress for smaller kids and as tunic for bigger kids - 17 ½ inches from shoulder to bottom hem - 22 ½ inches chest circumference - 30 inches bottom hem circumference
